World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 15 日星期一 18:54:21 GMT 120
Azerbaijan arrests journalist, charges another as press crackdown continuesAzerbaijani police on Monday arrested one journalist and ordered pre-trial detention for another, the latest reporters to face legal trouble since a crackdown on the country's independent media that began in November. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 18:35:12 GMT 6REV33PDCFM3NDDPXCO5OC7LUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/azerbaijan-arrests-journalist-charges-another-press-crackdown-continues-2024-01-15/Reuters世界亚太地区
Agencies consider new aid route into Sudan as humanitarian crisis worsensAid agencies are looking at delivering aid to Sudan on a new route from South Sudan as they struggle to access much of the country, a senior U.N. official said on Monday, nine months into a war that has caused a major humanitarian crisis. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:51:49 GMT FV2IN3AMIBJDXBMBMP4QP2HM4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/agcies-consider-new-aid-route-into-sudan- humanarian-crisis-worsens-2024-01-15/Aidan Lewis世界非洲
Yemen's Houthis say they will target US shipsThe Yemeni Houthi movement will expand its targets to include U.S. ships, an official from the Iran-allied group said on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:43:32 GMT 3YHCEFTVYZJGNB6Q4OWQW6GGJA https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/yemens-houthis-say-they-will-target-us-ships-2024-01-15/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Dangerously cold temps continue across US as 2024 presidential race begins in IowaMuch of the United States remained gripped by an Arctic blast on Monday, cutting power to tens of thousands of customers in northern states and Texas and potentially dampening turnout in Iowa, where voters will cast the first ballots for a Republican candidate in November's presidential race. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:34:50 GMT DWJ7LFJJMRNAHNUOKO3RQYUQCU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/dangerously-cold-temps-continue-across-us-2024-presidential-race-begins-iowa-2024-01-15/Reuters世界美国
Switzerland to host Ukraine peace summit at Zelenskiy's requestSwitzerland on Monday agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine at the request of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:12:44 GMT MVD4YYSMPRLTBJG36QVVELGEYE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-wants-china-join-global-peace-summit-2024-01-15/John Revill世界欧洲
Prominent Ukrainian journalist says unknown intruders tried to storm his homeA prominent Ukrainian investigative journalist who has frequently criticised senior government officials said on Monday that his home was visited by unidentified men who tried to break down his door and demand that he join the army. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 16:38:13 GMT CTMIWMPWJJIZTBZDDZGB2AW5CE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/prominent-ukrainian-journalist-says-unknown-intruders-tried-storm-his-home-2024-01-15/Max Hunder世界欧洲
Armed gang attack military camp, village in Nigeria's northwestArmed men stormed a military camp in Nahuta village, northwest Nigeria, sending troops fleeing and setting vehicles ablaze before proceeding to loot shops and homes, a resident and two sources said on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 16:20:53 GMT DFRK23KHEBMP3LXC6NCU2XH23I https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/armed-gang-attack-military-camp-village-nigerias-northwest-2024-01-15/Ahmed Kingimi世界非洲
Russian air strikes focus on Ukrainian military industry for now - KyivRussia has focused its recent air attacks on the Ukrainian military-industrial complex although the threat to energy facilities remains high, a senior military spy official was quoted as saying on Monday by the RBC-Ukraine news site. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 16:04:54 GMT CCT5D7YMLRP6FOFGI4J4SQRJ5M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-air-strikes-focus-ukrainian-military-industry-now-kyiv-2024-01-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Congo election commission overspent, awarded opaque contracts- reportCongo's national election commission failed to account for $400 million of funds it received from the state, and awarded opaque procurement contracts ahead of the disputed December general election, an EU-funded civil society report said Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 16:04:28 GMT VCSUMJL7CVICXHI5VCXDVNCBWE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-election-commission-overspent-awarded-opaque-contracts-report-2024-01-15/Sonia Rolley世界非洲
Ukraine ground commander says his troops, now on 'active defence', can still surpriseHis demeanour is dispassionate and his message is clear: Ukraine's ground forces are focused first and foremost on defence along the eastern stretch of the 1,000-km (600-mile) front under his command. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:39:17 GMT VUWENHEEFNMNBGCK5YTYU5DLGI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-ground-commander-says-his-troops-now-active-defence-can-still-surprise-2024-01-15/Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Yemen's Houthis hit US-owned dry bulk ship, no injuries - US CentcomHouthi forces in Yemen struck the U.S.-owned and operated dry bulk ship Gibraltar Eagle with an anti-ship ballistic missile, U.S Central Command said on Monday, although there were no reports of injuries or significant damage. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:28:08 GMT 26H3RVNSUNORX高威ZAG5AT3M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uk-marine-monitoring-report-vessel-hit-by-missile-east-yemens-aden-2024-01-15/Ahmed Elimam, Tala Ramadan世界中东
